website_summaries.verdict: This electric grinder from a trusted brand is a step up from other household models.
pros: Grinds as much as three pounds of meat per minute
Features two sausage attachments, including one for breakfast links
cons: Complaints of clogging even though it features a reverse function that should keep the grinder running smoothly

customer_reviews.title: Do not wash in a dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: After use in the dishwasher, the shiny parts turn black, wash only with hands, metal of poor quality, me back my money
customer_reviews.author: Worldowner

customer_reviews.title: Home Workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: This is a workhorse for your kitchen! Used it to process a lot of meat this year and never bogged down. Followed the directions and super easy to use. Easy to clean and store. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: jul25

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Weak motor Cheap quality Looks so cheap Really slow Only come with one cutter plate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: waring MG 105 meat grinder
customer_reviews.text: This grinder does what it should but I found that when I make sausage Its better to run your product through it only once and select cutting plate size accordingly. cube meat in small pieces, combine meat and seasonings, mix well and run it through. It works fine for small amounts but would take along time processing large amounts. easy to set up, easy to clean, seems to be constructed well. This is my first electric grinder, I have only used the old fashioned manual grinders and this grinder is an improvement. Overall for the price, I believe its a good value
customer_reviews.author: rhg1

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a Christmas gift for my husband who is a hunter so he hasn’t opened it yet. But I think he will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motor broke during 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make home made cat food. Worked great the first two times. Halfway through the third batch the motor broke. I emailed Waring through their web site because it has a "limited 5 year warranty" on the motor. We'll see how they handle it. Meanwhile, back to hand chopping.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The switch to turn on is located in the back. To make it more user friendly the switch needs to be on the top or side
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Internal mechanism made of plastic, broke after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Capcanari

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. Would recommend spending a bit more for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. Would recommend spending a bit more for the higher HP motor. It's slow but effective
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Meat Grinder
customer_reviews.text: First foray into grinding my/our own meat since I was a kid in the 50s. Really happy with this. It's a quality first step/toe in the water appliance. Works just fine and we probably won't ever need anything else for our moderate use, two person household.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Smith

customer_reviews.title: No disappointments
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, assembles and disassemble very easily, and a breeze to operate, extremely easy to clean and stores very efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Richard. Miller

customer_reviews.title: eh... not impressed
customer_reviews.text: does it grind meat: yes. is it "easy" to use and clean: kinda does it hold up to USAGE and CLEANING?: nope. it does not. all the parts are tarnished after only three uses/washes. i am NOT happy
customer_reviews.author: Shalene

customer_reviews.title: Good Grinder
customer_reviews.text: The grinder came earlier than the predicted ship time. I've only used it once, but it worked wonderfully. It ground the meat from an 18 pound turkey as fast as I could get the meat in the tray, without bogging down. I ground at a medium size, but wished I'd had used the larger one, to get a few more chucks in my turkey burgers. I wish the book had come with a few more recipes, but they are plentiful on the net. Great product. All I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: codeman

customer_reviews.title: garbage`
customer_reviews.text: used it a total of 10 times to ground packaged steaks for beef tartar and the thing gave out on me.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley & Crystal Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: For home use it is a fine machine.
customer_reviews.text: We made our own ground chuck for burgers and it did a fast and thorough job of a 3lb of chuck steak!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best I love it
customer_reviews.text: after two months of work broke. I repaired an autorized service center and breaks again .
customer_reviews.author: STANIMIR NACHEV

customer_reviews.title: It was a good purchase for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to learn and use and did an excellent job
customer_reviews.author: Fran Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the light weight of this meat grinder and versatility.We can do so much with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge C

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, easy to assemble and clean
customer_reviews.text: The product came mostly assembled. After use, it was easy to disassemble and wash up and reassemble when dry. I've only used it once, to make ground turkey. It is fairly slow, but it worked well and didn't clog. The turkey was ground fine enough that it didn't require a second grinding, which I thought it might. A good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Busterbobby

customer_reviews.title: Noisy!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this thing is so noisy my neighbor stopped working on his motorcycle and asked me to quiet down. Other than the noise issue this product works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: ... grinder several times since our purchase and are extremely Pleased with quality
customer_reviews.text: we have used this meat grinder several times since our purchase and are extremely Pleased with quality, craftsmanship, speed, etc. well worth the money spent, Great addition to our kitchen. Hunters...this is an amazing way to create deer burger and deer sausage would def. recommend this product. Even after running close to 80 lbs of meat this little grinder performed top notch.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Easy use and clean
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my father. He absolutely loved it. Will recommend others to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Knazari

customer_reviews.title: They loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my daughter and her bf for Christmas. They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Functional and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well if meat is void of Silver skin. Cut pieces into small strips of 2 " or less. Plastic internal parts are a weakness. Functional and easy to operate
customer_reviews.author: David Walsh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this is very poorly made. there is no return policy on it. broke within first months.
customer_reviews.author: Anna N.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good durable product but damaged
customer_reviews.text: I received the item with cracked Feed Screw Pin! Check the photo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: egg rolls and sausage happening now
customer_reviews.text: it works fine. the comments of other users were helpful. i knew to not try to overload the machine. i made some good sausage.
customer_reviews.author: billy harrison

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in excellent condition, all the parts were in the box and I'm extremely happy eitj it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works well as far as getting meat ground. ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works well as far as getting meat ground. Must be very careful that all pieces are correct and tightened well. This is a very basic, lightweight product- OK for occasional use. Could have been a little sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: G V

customer_reviews.title: Good grinder for small family
customer_reviews.text: First time using a grinder for hamburger instead of pink slime store bought variety. Easy to use, would suggest medium blade, and easy to clean. Would use next time for a minimum of 5 lbs of beef, not worth setting up and cleaning for less. Good grinder for the price, would recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Linda Meola

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for grinding my meats and vegetables. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan @ Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: waring M.G.105 professional meat grinder
customer_reviews.text: Th e only knock I have against this is that it doesn't grind the meat completely.There i s always residue in the chute.
customer_reviews.author: scout

customer_reviews.title: Did not like it at all...open package.
customer_reviews.text: The package was already open, it looked used. The grinder looks cheap, and it looks like it would not last. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and assemble. I use it to grind chicken and beef for burgers and meatballs.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, just don't put it in the dishwasher. It says not dishwasher safe but I missed it and the parts are no good and no warranty. I bought a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: got it and used it the first night great product mainly bought it for the making of jerky grinds up meat just right.
customer_reviews.author: Chriss

customer_reviews.title: MG105 Meat Grinder
customer_reviews.text: This item was recommended to our son. We did not need anything fancy, just something simple and easy to use. This is our first experience with a meat grinder and we find it is good quality and easy on your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Waring Meat Grinder
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt actually call it a professional grinder. It worked well the first time I used it, However, the second time it kept clogging up to the point where I quit and got out my food processor. The recipe said to use the fine grind attachment; it clogged up even the large one. I'll try one more time; and, if it keeps doing what it done the second--it will go on the shelf as an almost ran. Purchase with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Womack

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Used it to grind beef and deer to make sausage. It worked well and not bad to clean. I do wish the base was a bit heavier, so it would be more stable when your pushing meat into it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Caven

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS AS A GIFT AND THE RECIPIENT JUST LOVES IT AND WAS SOOOO EXCITED TO HAVE THIS IN THEIR KITCHEN!!
customer_reviews.author: QT-the-TQ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good and easy to use and is more helpful than we thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It still works fine, but just not as pretty
customer_reviews.text: The meat grinder actually worked much faster than I originally expected. I was able to process 25 pounds of venison, cut and wrapped in under an hour. I was very impressed. Where I went wrong, was to not read directions. It clearly states not to wash parts in a dishwasher, which I did. This resulted in stripping the chrome finish off the metal parts, leaving the steel oxidized. It still works fine, but just not as pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought it just one month and broke in one month
customer_reviews.author: jack jina

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE PINK SLIME
customer_reviews.text: I READ ABOUT PINK SLIME IN HAMBURGER AND DECIDED TO DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT. WE BOUGHT THIS GRINDER AND NOW MAKE OUR OWN HAMBURGER FROM DIFFERENT CUTS OF BEEF. REALLY CAN TASTE THE DIFFERENCE.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: christmastime
customer_reviews.text: this is a Christmas gift. I am rating 5 stars and will work well inasmuch as waring is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn sheriff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it worked okay for what I used it for vegetables
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK JUNK JUNK JUNK JUNK
customer_reviews.text: groung exactally 3 lbs of soft poirk....then started clunking...then gears strpped so i am stuck with another online P O S....this is the third irem ordered from amazon that broke within one day.....buyer be ware
customer_reviews.author: unclebuck

customer_reviews.title: It is OK but not exactly I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: It is OK but not exactly I was looking for. I will use it , I hepo I can create some dishes soon.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Galvez

customer_reviews.title: Waring Grinder
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it but was hoping for it to be faster with the grinding. Overall, it is a nice grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Foltting

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The Professional meat grinder was working and really good. I don't need go to super market buy the ground meat anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: trash
customer_reviews.text: this is the worst thing i have ever used in my life, 3 mins into the grinding it is jammed up, clear obstruction, 3 mins later jammed again, the process went on two more times and it is in the TRASH. THIS ITEM SHOULD NOT BE ALLOWED TO BE SOLD.
customer_reviews.author: brian and lin sandiford

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Slightly annoying to clean, but overall, it's an awesome tool for any kitchen. It is also a great $ saver!
customer_reviews.author: ashley hale

customer_reviews.title: one star
customer_reviews.text: Machine started to make loud noise first week it was purchased as if something is wearing out or breaking with simple lamb meat grinding, abnormal machine noise. Metal/ tray or plate color started to change and got dark after first (non machine washer) wash and cleaning, VERY disappointed with the product. Product purchased on 09/07/16, and unfortunately your policy does not allow for a return or exchange for different brand. Not a good product, total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Azad Talanani

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I used chuck roast and it keeps getting clogged. I am sure it works fine with chicken, as seen on video.
customer_reviews.author: oc

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: A friend had one of these. We were fortunate enough to be able to try it out before we bought it. It was great! We have used ours. I love being able to make ground meat and sausages with wholesome ingredients no additives, preservatives, etc. We have been using it most recently with venison. The recipes that we have tried that are in the manual are great. We also have tried others we like to. It is fun and easy, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money i paid . Just don't Leave it in the dish water over knight shiney parts turn black. j
customer_reviews.author: Roy Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We have only had our grinder for a few days but we love it so far. We decided to purchase it because of purchasing meat in bulk for cost savings. The first time we used it was to grind pork. It cleans easily. If we could change anything about it we would place the on/off switch on the side instead of on the back.
customer_reviews.author: chrtmcd

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work in the UK!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful machine but of course being from the USA the voltage is wrong for the UK and the plug is American. I called the cuisinart British helpline who informed me that even with a transformer it wouldn't work properly in the UK. Sadly this didn't occur to me when I bought it.I was offered an £80.00 refund from Amazon but the shipping costs were going to be £60 so it wasn't worth it. I am gutted and surprised that it was even offered as an option for purchase on the Amazon UK website. Misleading?
customer_reviews.author: babs williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only used once for grinding about 20 lbs of venison and brisket for HB meat. Having used a hand crank grinder to make 50lbs of sausage last year, this was a much better. Faster and no sore muscles afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: B. McDougald

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked fine, but no big enough or fast enough for our use.
customer_reviews.author: J W HURT

customer_reviews.title: Poor unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit could not grind tissue paper! Spent 2hrs trying to grind one pound of meat. Jams every few minutes, Stay away
customer_reviews.author: Kennet Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great, but meat gets stuck in the motor and grows mold
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift and the recipient loved it until it started having a funny smell after thoroughly cleaning, after using only a few times. Finally had to take it apart to see that meat was getting stuck in the motor and growing mold. Barf.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burlington

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this meat grinder back in late May. We had an older model and had used that for over 10 years before it died. Loved it at first because it worked well. Then in just 2 months, it started making noises and stopped working. This was very disappointing seeing we were sticking with the same brand and model because it worked well before. Would not buy one with that mentality again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grinder.  Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I cut venison into 1" square strips and dropped in. The grinder pulled it straight in and is ready for more. The bullet was in one piece of meat and after the grinder jumped around, I found the slug and got it out. The grinder was ready to go again. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: not that strong
customer_reviews.text: i am not satisfied with this named as professional meat grinder,the truth is very difficult to grind meat and if you arrive to grind a small quantity of meat which has to be fat and skins free,you will need to redo the grinding.....it's not worth to pay that sum for it????
customer_reviews.author: hamid ben

customer_reviews.title: Not So Professional
customer_reviews.text: We had the older model for many years until the shaft of the grinding auger wore out. A replacement cost over $30. We decided to buy this newer model from Amazon. After using it for only a day, the unit would jam and then overheat. We returned it for a refund. I thought professional included durability and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine the first 3 times then the part that turns ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine the first 3 times then the part that turns to push the meat through got stripped (like screws etc.) and it would not turn anymore. Have had issues getting a replacement or repair.
customer_reviews.author: Page A. Leindecker

customer_reviews.title: Waring MG105 Professional Meat Grinder
customer_reviews.text: I quit buying ground beef at the store because of all the media attention pink sludge has received and, instead, started buying roasts and grinding them with this meat grinder. This thing has some power, after trimming and cutting a 5lb roast, I usually grind it in just a couple minutes. The price I picked this up for (about $50) has proven to be unbeatable too!
customer_reviews.author: BigD

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe hand wash only
customer_reviews.text: Works great sucks you have to had wash it and can't put in dishwasher other than that works great
customer_reviews.author: Albert T. Phillips III

customer_reviews.title: Great Meat Grinder
customer_reviews.text: When I received the meat Grinder and opened the package, it was a pleasant surprise. It looked nice like a professional solid peice of kitchen equipment. The pleasant suprise is the speed with which you can grind beef, chicken, and lamb to the desired size. It is very easy to dismantle for cleaning and putting it back together. In general, it does a great job in a home kitchen and I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Osman M. Aly

customer_reviews.title: like it but
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to wash by hand. When I put into the dishwasher, it changed color. But I can still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Received product Timely opened it up washed it and used it it's as easy as that works best with chicken that is partially frozen not completely thawed ground it made chicken patties and was amazed at how easy it was
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Well designed. If used as it was designed (Medium/light duty) it looks like it should last.
customer_reviews.author: Alain V.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for beef and chicken and it works very well. It is important to use as defined in the directions. I can grind up 10 pounds of beef or chicken very fast. Clean up as with anything like this is time consuming but very important to keep all parts very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: I do love the end results
customer_reviews.text: I clog it quite often, but I probably haven't achieved my stride as an effective meat cutter, to be honest. I do love the end results.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine miller

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for someone and have been told that they love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone and have been told that they love it!
customer_reviews.author: thericker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a grinder that was powerful, but not something I needed to run a butcher shop. Grinding my own hamburger meat and making homemade sausage is both fun and frugal, and the Waring Meat Grinder meets this purpose perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ed B.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great, I almost got the cabelas 1/2 hp for $500, good thing I didnt, i did my entire deer with this in less than 1 hr, not one problem at all, good grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo R Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder and prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I make homemade breakfast sausage with this all the time. Got tired of too salty or spicy sausage you buy in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Raywen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, I always stay with this brand because it has the long life that I need from products like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Z Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Great Burger Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Arrived packaged well and on time. Immediately ground some elk burger and it worked very well. Well pleased and do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mtnbilly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't use it that many times but it been great the few times I have, it's easy to clean and does the job exactly the way it suppose to, and it looks good in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Ysh

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice! My family is going to really enjoy this kitchen appliance. Price was right and it arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Petie

customer_reviews.title: Waring grinder
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. Meat goes through very easily. Plenty of power. Did two lbs at a time twice. It makes home burgers loke you think thry dhould.
customer_reviews.author: BHERRERAJ

customer_reviews.title: meat grinder
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, i am please with it and made my first batch of sausage last week, i will better at it the next time..:)
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good machine.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses it a lot for making deer burgers. Good machine.
customer_reviews.author: Molokaidiva

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great, a bit of trouble washing the pieces that aren't dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Maude Guidry Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grinder! Don't go cheap on a kitchen item that needs to work WELL! Get this one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: A FIVE STAR Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Waring has the right idea, the MG105 Grinder is easy to use and easy to clean. I recommand this grinder to any one who wants to improve the grinding grade of their meat or is trying to combine differant cuts of meat.
customer_reviews.author: breezy

customer_reviews.title: made by plastic, aluminum
customer_reviews.text: after opening its package, I found it is made by plastic, aluminum, etc. no steel, no iron. not safe for food processing. The return is 30 days. I missed it. It is a worst buy I got on amazon. don't know why it got four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Mondota

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: I HAD TO REPLACE MY MEAT GRINDER. IT WAS VERY OLD. I ONLY USE IT ONCE OR TWICE A YEAR. I MAKE FRESH HASH FROM CORNED BEEF. WE ONLY EAT IT AFTER ST. PATRICK'S DAY. I WASN'T SURE IF I WOULD LIKE A NWER MODEL. I DIDN'T KNOW THE SWITCH WENT BACK AND FORTH. I PUSHED THE BUTTON BUT NOTHING HAPPENED. I REALIZED THE GRINDER HAD A BACKUP ON IT. I FINALLY HAD IT WORKING RIGHT. THERE ARE 2 BLADES FOR IT. I ENDED UP USING THE LARGER CUTTING ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty practical
customer_reviews.text: This item serves really good, a housewife can depend on it in her daily meals preparing, its price makes it the best deal to find for meat grinders
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Alnakkash

customer_reviews.title: aluminum parts turned black
customer_reviews.text: After first use, using regular dish washing soap all the aluminum parts turned black, not only nasty looking but leaves a black film an your hands and not very sturdy, feels flimsy, probably won't hold up to much regular use
customer_reviews.author: SlashQuixote

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: We used the grinder twice and it broke on the second time. Very loud internal noises. Reading the other reviews I am going to guess that the gears are gone, especially if the gears are plastic. Let's see what the return policy is with Amazon. Ordered on March 3rd, Received shipment on March 6th. Broke on second use on March 21st. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kayhan Yegenoglu

customer_reviews.title: My favorite machine
customer_reviews.text: This grinder works and looks great. I grind all my own hamburger and does and excellent job. I also use it for grinding left over baked ham for western eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Wedding Gift For Sure.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this white Waring meat grinder as a wedding present for a niece living in Grand Rapid MI. The husband to be is a hunter and will enjoy this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: bad workmanship
customer_reviews.text: recevieved grinder. however, did not remove and inspect. until later,finsh metal coating was peeling and flaking off on grinder that never got used
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Doakes

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars plus
customer_reviews.text: This Meat Grinder works wonderful. The sausage stuffer is easy to use and I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: lela pool

customer_reviews.title: stay away
customer_reviews.text: Emits burning smell when turned on. It sounded like its going to die on me when grinding meat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Slick

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used it yet, but it looks great and is easy to assemble. We will be making sausage soon. Never did that before. The recipes look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Bachman

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Electric Meat Grinder, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Style Name:Cuisinart Meat GrinderThe Cuisinart Electric Meat Grinder effortlessly grinds a wide variety of meats, guaranteeing freshness and quality when making family favorites like burgers, meatloaf, meatballs, sausages, chili, and pates. The powerful 300-watt motor quickly grinds up to 3 pounds per minute, for professional grinding results. The grinder offers plenty of options with 2 cutting plates for medium and coarse thickness, as well as 2 sausage attachments for breakfast links and regular sausages. The single on/off switch, along with a reverse feature make operation as simple as can be.
feature_bullets: Grinds a wide variety of meats, including beef, chicken, turkey, venison and more. Cord length : 34 Inches
Powerful 300-watt motor grinds up to 3 pounds of meat per minute
Features two metal cutting plates for varying degrees of thickness: medium and coarse
Includes two sausage attachments for making breakfast links and regular sausages
Reverse function releases clogged foods to ensure smooth operation
